Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 62nd overall pick, by Toledo in 1974...
Injured on 5/15/1974 with a Strained Rib Cage Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 4/30/1979 with a Bruised Heel, out for 3 days...
Injured on 6/1/1979 with a Strained Thigh Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/26/1980, off Daniel Pardo (NE)...
Injured on 6/11/1982 with a Sprained Ankle, out for 5 days...
Traded from Toledo to Wisconsin on 7/8/1984 (Going to TOL: P J. Minor, P J. Gilland. Going to WIS: P R. Miller Jr., LF J. Jaquez)...
Hit first career homerun on 7/22/1985, off James Willman (TOL)...
